intro:
Piyokoro returns as a Puzzle Game!
Connect pieces by Color and Shape!
Play solo or with up to four players!
description:
"PIYO PUZZ" is a fun puzzle game where you aim for high scores by clearing pieces.

You can play solo or challenge friends and family in multiplayer mode with up to 4 players!

The game offers two modes:
 - Single Mode: Aim for a high score within the time limit.
 - Multiplayer Mode: Split into two teams and compete for the highest score with up to four players.

Meet a delightful cast of characters like chicks, sparrows, penguins, and more!
Each character has unique skills, so try different ones to boost your score.
Play often, and you may even unlock new characters!

[How to Play]
 - Connect puzzle pieces by "same color" or "same shape" to clear them.
 - Clear more pieces in a single move to earn a higher score.
 - Clear "Snack Pieces" to fill the snack gauge.
 - When the snack gauge reaches six, you can activate your character’s skill.
 - Special pieces like "Wild Pieces", which connect to any color or shape, and "Trick Pieces" make gameplay even more exciting.

[Single Mode]
 - Play solo to reach a high score within the time limit! Clear as many pieces as possible for a top score.

[Multiplayer Mode]
 - Compete in teams with 2 to 4 players in a race for the highest score!
 - One player from each team takes turns playing the puzzle. After five moves, it’s the next player’s turn.
 - While waiting, teammates can cheer on the current player, which might bring extra bonuses!
 Note: Each player needs a controller for multiplayer mode.
